Comments_List: So far, this course has done a great job of helping me develop skills in providing constructive feedback on academic works in progress. I've also learned how to improve my presentation skills and offered tips on how to give a better presentation.
Really dislike that we have to ask questions in seminar. Comments should be encouraged, supported, but not required. I'm not sure its a helpful practice.

I really like the structure of the course - having each of us do a presentation is helpful presenting practice, and it's also very helpful for us to give each other feedback. It's also helpful to have discussions about the strengths and weaknesses of the papers. Finally, it's great to get practice writing reviews.
Yes, I would recommend this course to another student. It's been very helpful in learning how to provide feedback.
